definition: to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: And many other smart shoppers are doing the same.
sentences.chinese: 许多其他的一些聪明的店主也都在开寄销商店。

sentences.english: With the downturn in the economy, consignment shops are booming.
sentences.chinese: 随着经济状况的下降，寄销商店变得很普遍。

sentences.english: We wish to cover the consignment against all risk from our Warehouse at the above address to the port of New York.
sentences.chinese: 本公司欲为该批寄销投以从上址仓库至纽约港的全保。

definition: to buy on credit/to delay payment
to sell as agent/to sell on commission (e.g. insurance policies)/proxy sale (of stocks)
variant of 訂貨|订货[ding4 huo4]
to have exclusive selling rights/to be the sole agent for a production unit or firm
to defer payment/to pay back over long term
to receive sth on another's behalf
to work in an enterprise for a share of the profits
